:bar_chart: On Geostat's website, the [National Agency for Crime Prevention and Probation](https://www.facebook.com/CenterforCrimePrevention) releases a monthly update on [criminal justice statistics](https://www.geostat.ge/en/modules/categories/679/unified-report-on-criminal-justice-statistics) (Chapter IV, Section 12). Appendix - Table # 56 - # 78 contains the data related probation.

:bar_chart: Under the project of SPACE II, the probation related [statistics](https://wp.unil.ch/space/space-ii/annual-reports/) of 47 member countries of the Council of Europe, including Georgia are published yearly. 

:bar_chart: [Statistics](http://diversion.ge/?action=page&pid=52&lang=geo) of the Diversion and Mediation Department is available at [www.diversion.ge](http://www.diversion.ge/?action=page&pid=51&lang=eng). 

:bar_chart: [Blog](https://temurgugushvili.ge/ka/category/%E1%83%90%E1%83%93%E1%83%9B%E1%83%98%E1%83%9C%E1%83%98%E1%83%A1%E1%83%A2%E1%83%A0%E1%83%90%E1%83%AA%E1%83%98%E1%83%A3%E1%83%9A%E1%83%98-%E1%83%9B%E1%83%9D%E1%83%9C%E1%83%90%E1%83%AA%E1%83%94%E1%83%9B%E1%83%94%E1%83%91%E1%83%98/) on crime-related administrative data published by public institutions.
